title: Moonspeaker
description: In this first book in the House of Moons series, we are introduced to Haemas Sennay Tal - The Moonspeaker. Daughter of one of the most powerful families of the mind talented Kashi, Haemas has lived a life of privilege until her life was shattered by a brutal attack on her father and the accusation that she committed the heinous crime. Forced to flee across the Forsaken Barrier, she learns that her father's death was only a small part of the much bigger plot to destroy the fabric of reality itself. Haemas must master her extraordinary mind talents before she is killed - and the fabric of her world is destroyed.
author: K.D. Wentworth
